title: 136: Work-Life Balance with Melissa Ambrosini + Nick Broadhurst
itunes:title: 136: Work-Life Balance with Melissa Ambrosini + Nick Broadhurst
description:
While dancing on the beach, I was reminded how important work-life balance is. In this world of social media, it can be a very difficult thing to maintain. I sat down with my dear friends Melissa Ambrosini + Nick Broadhurst to discuss how this married, business-partner duo manages work/life balance.. And their tips are SO inspiring.

Get mentored by Nick, Melissa and I in the Path to Freedom Program. We teach you step-by-step on how to create a thriving business with DoTerra essential oils.

Begin your adventure at iamsahararose.com/freedom

Melissa Ambrosini is the bestselling author of Mastering Your Mean Girl, host of 'The Melissa Ambrosini Show' podcast, a motivational speaker, an entrepreneur and self-love teacher.

Nick Broadhurst is a singer/ songwriter/ film producer/ podcast host and meditation and Ayurveda advocate. Together they co-founded the Path to Freedom Program.

Join our team at iamsahararose.com/freedom

Get 35% off your order of Youveda supplements at youveda.com with code “sahara”

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books
